name: view screen
description: Captures the entire screen and converts it into an LLM-friendly, markdown description.

status.description: 'success' if the screen was described, 'error' otherwise.

description.example: The screen shows a Windows desktop with a taskbar at the bottom...
description.description: Markdown-friendly description generated by the VLM.

code:
import json
import core.internal_action_interface as iai

try:
    result = iai.InternalActionInterface.describe_screen()
    output = json.dumps({'status': 'success', 'description': result['description'], 'file_path': result['file_path'], 'message': ''})
except Exception as e:
    output = json.dumps({'status': 'error', 'description': '', 'file_path': '', 'message': str(e)})
